 8    Separating declarations here allows eval/diag.hpp to be used

10    example, in eval_fastconv.hpp.
11

30template <dimension_type Dim,
31	  typename       Block1,
32	  typename       Block2,
33	  bool           EarlyBinding>
34struct Dispatcher_helper;
35
36
37template <dimension_type Dim,
38	  typename       Block1,
39	  typename       Block2,
40	  typename       Tag
41	  = typename Dispatcher_helper<Dim, Block1, Block2, false>::type>
42struct Dispatcher;
